 38806                                  ; We need this "hook" here to detect these cases (like user sets one both of
 38807                                  ; vol_id and dir bits) because of the structure of the or $CreateNewFile loop
 38808                                  ; below. The code loops on error_access_denied, but if one of the non
 38809                                  ; changeable attributes is specified, the loop COULD be infinite or WILL be
 38810                                  ; infinite because CreateNewFile will fail with access_denied always. Thus we
 38811                                  ; need to detect these cases before getting to the loop.
 38812                                  
 38813                                  	;mov	ax, 5

 38879                                  ; The operation failed and the error has been mapped in AX. Grab the extended
 38880                                  ; error and figure out what to do.
 38881

 39176                                  ;BREAK <$LockOper - Lock Calls>
 39177                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39178                                  ;
 39179                                  ;   Assembler usage:
 39180                                  ;	    MOV     BX, Handle	       (DOS 3.3)
 39181                                  ;	    MOV     CX, OffsetHigh
 39182                                  ;	    MOV     DX, OffsetLow
 39183                                  ;	    MOV     SI, LengthHigh
 39184                                  ;	    MOV     DI, LengthLow
 39185                                  ;	    MOV     AH, LockOper
 39186                                  ;	    MOV     AL, Request
 39187                                  ;	    INT     21h
 39188                                  ;
 39189                                  ;   Error returns:
 39190                                  ;	    AX = error_invalid_handle
 39191                                  ;	       = error_invalid_function
 39192                                  ;	       = error_lock_violation
 39193                                  ;
 39194                                  ;   Assembler usage:
 39195                                  ;	    MOV     AX, 5C??	       (DOS 4.00)
 39196                                  ;
 39197                                  ;				    0? lock all
 39198                                  ;				    8? lock write
 39199                                  ;				    ?2 lock multiple
 39200                                  ;				    ?3 unlock multiple
 39201                                  ;				    ?4 lock/read
 39202                                  ;				    ?5 write/unlock
 39203                                  ;				    ?6 add (lseek EOF/lock/write/unlock)
 39204                                  ;	    MOV     BX, Handle
 39205                                  ;	    MOV     CX, count or size
 39206                                  ;	    LDS     DX, buffer
 39207                                  ;	    INT     21h
 39208                                  ;
 39209                                  ;   Error returns:
 39210                                  ;	    AX = error_invalid_handle
 39211                                  ;	       = error_invalid_function
 39212                                  ;	       = error_lock_violation
 39213                                  ;

 39595                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39596                                  ;   ShareEnd - terminate sharing info on a particular SFT/UID/PID. This does
 39597                                  ;       NOT perform a close, it merely asserts that the sharing information
 39598                                  ;       for the SFT/UID/PID may be safely released.
 39599                                  ;
 39600                                  ;   Inputs:     ES:DI points to an SFT
 39601                                  ;   Outputs:    None
 39602                                  ;   Registers modified: all except DS,ES,DI
 39603                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39604                                  
 39605                                  ShareEnd:
 39606                                  	; 26/07/2019
 39607 00007438 FF1E[9800]              	call	far [JShare+(2*4)]	; 2 = MFTClose
 39608 0000743C C3                      	retn
 39609                                  
 39610                                  ;Break <ShareEnter - attempt to enter a node into the sharing set>
 39611                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39612                                  ;   ShareEnter - perform a retried entry of a nodde into the sharing set. If
 39613                                  ;   the max number of retries is exceeded, we notify the user via int 24.
 39614                                  ;
 39615                                  ;   Inputs:     ThisSFT points to the SFT
 39616                                  ;               WFP_Start points to the WFP
 39617                                  ;   Outputs:    Carry clear => successful entry
 39618                                  ;               Carry set => failed system call
 39619                                  ;   Registers modified: all
 39620                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39621                                  
 39622                                  ShareEnter:
 39623 0000743D 51                      	push	cx
 39624                                  retry:
 39625 0000743E 8B0E[1A00]              	mov     cx,[RetryCount]
 39626                                  attempt:
 39627 00007442 C43E[9E05]              	les     di,[THISSFT]		; grab sft
 39628 00007446 31C0                    	XOR     AX,AX
 39629                                   	;mov	[es:di+51],axfff
 39630 00007448 26894533                	MOV     [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_MFT],AX ; indicate free SFT
 39631 0000744C 51                      	push	cx
 39632 0000744D E8BDFF                  	call    SHARE_CHECK             ; attempt to enter into the sharing set
 39633 00007450 59                      	pop	cx
 39634 00007451 730A                    	jnc	short done		; success, let the user see this
 39635 00007453 E8289E                  	call	Idle                    ; wait a while
 39636 00007456 E2EA                    	loop    attempt                 ; go back for another attempt
 39637 00007458 E8B7FF                  	call    SHARE_VIOLATION         ; signal the problem to the user
 39638 0000745B 73E1                    	jnc	short retry		; user said to retry, go do it
 39639                                  done:
 39640 0000745D 59                      	pop	cx
 39641 0000745E C3                      	retn
 39642

 39644                                  ; EXEPATCH.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 39645                                  ;============================================================================
 39646                                  ; 29/04/2019 - Retro DOS 4.0
 39647                                  
 39648                                  ;** EXEPATCH.ASM 
 39649                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39650                                  ;	Contains the foll:
 39651                                  ;
 39652                                  ;		- code to find and overlay buggy unpack code
 39653                                  ;		- new code to be overlayed on buggy unpack code 
 39654                                  ;		- old code sequence to identify buggy unpack code
 39655                                  ;
 39656                                  ;	Revision history:
 39657                                  ;
 39658                                  ;		Created: 5/14/90
 39659                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39660                                  
 39661                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39662                                  ;
 39663                                  ; M020 : Fix for rational bug - for details see routine header
 39664                                  ; M028 : 4b04 implementation
 39665                                  ; M030 : Fixing bug in EXEPACKPATCH (EXEC_CS is an un-relocated value)
 39666                                  ; M032 : set turnoff bit only if DOS in HMA.
 39667                                  ; M033 : if IP < 2 then not exepacked.
 39668                                  ; M046 : support for a 4th version of exepacked files.
 39669                                  ; M068 : support for copy protected apps.
 39670                                  ; M071 : use A20OFF_COUNT of 10.
 39671                                  ;
 39672                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39673                                  
 39674                                  PATCH1_COM_OFFSET	EQU	06CH
 39675                                  PATCH1_OFFSET		EQU	028H
 39676                                  PATCH1_CHKSUM		EQU	0EF4EH
 39677                                  CHKSUM1_LEN		EQU	11CH/2 ; 142
 39678                                  
 39679                                  PATCH2_COM_OFFSET	EQU	076H
 39680                                  PATCH2_OFFSET		EQU	032H
 39681                                  
 39682                                  	; The strings that start at offset 076h have two possible 
 39683                                  	; check sums that are defined as PATCH2_CHKSUM PATCH2A_CHKSUM
 39684                                  
 39685                                  PATCH2_CHKSUM		EQU	78B2H
 39686                                  CHKSUM2_LEN		EQU	119H/2
 39687                                  PATCH2A_CHKSUM		EQU	1C47H		; M046
 39688                                  CHKSUM2A_LEN		EQU	103H/2		; M046
 39689                                  
 39690                                  PATCH3_COM_OFFSET	EQU	074H
 39691                                  PATCH3_OFFSET		EQU	032H
 39692                                  PATCH3_CHKSUM		EQU	4EDEH
 39693                                  CHKSUM3_LEN		EQU	117H/2

 39695                                  ;**	Data structure passed for ExecReady call
 39696                                  ;
 39697                                  ;struc ERStruc
 39698                                  ; .ER_Reserved:	resw	1	; reserved, should be zero
 39699                                  ; .ER_Flags:	resw	1
 39700                                  ; .ER_ProgName:	resd	1	; ptr to ASCIIZ str of prog name
 39701                                  ; .ER_PSP:	resw	1	; PSP of the program
 39702                                  ; .ER_StartAddr: resd	1	; Start CS:IP of the program
 39703                                  ; .ER_ProgSize:	resd	1	; Program size including PSP
 39704                                  ; .size:
 39705                                  ;endstruc

 39709                                  	; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0

 39711                                  
 39712                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 39713                                  	; DOSCODE:B37Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 39714                                  
 39715                                  ; M028 - BEGIN
 39716                                  
 39717                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39718                                  ;
 39719                                  ;	Procedure Name		: ExecReady
 39720                                  ;
 39721                                  ;	Input			: DS:DX -> ERStruc (see exe.inc)
 39722                                  ;
 39723                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39724                                  
 39725                                  ExecReady:
 39726 0000745F 89D6                    	mov	si,dx			; move the pointer into a friendly one
 39727                                  	;;test	word [si+2],1
 39728                                  	; 17/12/2022
 39729 00007461 F6440201                	test	byte [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; 1
 39730                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; COM or EXE ?
 39731 00007465 7413                    	jz	short er_setver		; only setver for .COM files
 39732                                  
 39733                                  	;mov	ax,[si+8]
 39734 00007467 8B4408                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]
 39735 0000746A 83C010                  	add	ax,10h
 39736 0000746D 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 39737                                  
 39738                                  	;mov	cx,[si+10]
 39739 0000746F 8B4C0A                  	mov	cx,[si+ERStruc.ER_StartAddr]   ; M030
 39740                                  	;mov	cx,[si+12]
 39741 00007472 8B440C                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_StartAddr+2] ; M030
 39742                                  
 39743 00007475 36FF16[1212]            	call	[ss:FixExePatch]
 39744                                  	
 39745                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 39746                                  	;call	[ss:Rational386PatchPtr]
 39747                                  
 39748                                  er_setver:
 39749                                  	;;test	word [si+2],2		; Q: is this an overlay
 39750                                  	; 17/12/2022
 39751 0000747A F6440202                	test	byte [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_OVERLAY ; 2
 39752                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_OVERLAY
 39753 0000747E 7518                    	jnz	short er_chkdoshi	; Y: set A20OFF_COUNT if DOS high
 39754                                  					; N: set up lie version first
 39755 00007480 1E                      	push	ds
 39756 00007481 56                      	push	si
 39757                                  	;lds	si,[si+4]
 39758 00007482 C57404                  	lds	si,[si+ERStruc.ER_ProgName]
 39759 00007485 E870ED                  	call	Scan_Execname1
 39760 00007488 E881ED                  	call	Scan_Special_Entries
 39761 0000748B 5E                      	pop	si
 39762 0000748C 1F                      	pop	ds
 39763                                  	;mov	es,[si+8]
 39764 0000748D 8E4408                  	mov	es,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]
 39765 00007490 36A1[BD0E]              	mov	ax,[ss:SPECIAL_VERSION]
 39766 00007494 26A34000                	mov	[es:PDB.Version],ax
 39767                                  
 39768                                  er_chkdoshi:
 39769 00007498 36803E[1112]00          	cmp	byte [ss:DosHasHMA],0	; M032: Q: is dos in HMA (M021)
 39770 0000749E 741F                    	je	short er_done		; M032: N: done
 39771                                  
 39772                                  					; M068 - Start
 39773                                  	;mov	ax,[si+8]
 39774 000074A0 8B4408                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]	; ax = PSP
 39775                                  
 39776                                  	;or	byte [ss:DOS_FLAG],4
 39777 000074A3 36800E[8600]04          	or	byte [ss:DOS_FLAG],EXECA20OFF ; Set bit to signal int 21
 39778                                  					; ah = 25 & ah= 49. See dossym.inc 
 39779                                  					; under TAG M003 & M009 for 
 39780                                  					; explanation
 39781                                  	;;test	word [si+2],1
 39782                                  	; 17/12/2022
 39783 000074A9 F6440201                	test	byte [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; 1
 39784                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; Q: COM file
 39785 000074AD 7507                    	jnz	short er_setA20		; N: inc a20off_count, set 
 39786                                  					;    a20off_psp and ret
 39787 000074AF 1E                         	push	ds
 39788 000074B0 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; DS = load segment of com file.
 39789 000074B2 E85D03                  	call	IsCopyProt		; check if copy protected
 39790 000074B5 1F                      	pop	ds
 39791                                  
 39792                                  er_setA20:
 39793                                  	; We need to inc the A20OFF_COUNT here. Note that if the count
 39794                                  	; is non-zero at this point it indicates that the A20 is to be 
 39795                                  	; turned off for that many int 21 calls made by the app. In 
 39796                                  	; addition the A20 has to be turned off when we exit from this 
 39797                                  	; call. Hence the inc.
 39798                                  
 39799 000074B6 36FE06[8500]            	inc	byte [ss:A20OFF_COUNT]		
 39800 000074BB 36A3[6300]              	mov	[ss:A20OFF_PSP],ax	; set the PSP for which A20 is to be
 39801                                  					; turned OFF.
 39802                                  er_done:				; M068 - End
 39803 000074BF 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 39804 000074C1 C3                      	retn
 39805                                  
 39806                                  ; M028 - END

 39812                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39813                                  ;
 39814                                  ; procedure : Rational386Patch
 39815                                  ;
 39816                                  ; Older versions of the Rational DOS Extender have several bugs which trash
 39817                                  ; 386 registers (usually just the high word of 32 bit registers) during
 39818                                  ; interrupt processing. Lotus 123 3.1+ is a popular application that uses a
 39819                                  ; version of the Rational extender with the 32 bit register trashing bugs.
 39820                                  ;
 39821                                  ; This routine applies patches to the Rational DOS Extender to work around
 39822                                  ; most of the register trashing bugs.
 39823                                  ;
 39824                                  ; Note that there are additional register trashing bugs not fixed by these
 39825                                  ; patches. In particular, the high word of ESP and the FS and GS registers
 39826                                  ; may be modified on interrupts.
 39827                                  ;
 39828                                  ; There are two different Rational DOS Extender patchs in this module.
 39829                                  ; Rational386Patch is to correct 386 register trashing bugs on 386 or later
 39830                                  ; processors. This patch code is executed when MS-DOS is running on a 386
 39831                                  ; or later processor, regardless of whether MS-DOS is running in the HMA
 39832                                  ; or not.
 39833                                  ;
 39834                                  ; The other Rational patch routine (RationalPatch, below) fixes a register
 39835                                  ; trashing problem on 286 processors, and is only executed if MS-DOS is
 39836                                  ; running in the HMA.
 39837                                  ;
 39838                                  ; This patch detection and replacement is based on an example supplied by
 39839                                  ; Ben Williams at Rational.
 39840                                  ;
 39841                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39842                                  
 39843                                  ; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 39844                                  ; DOSCODE:B448h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 39845                                  
 39846                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39847                                  ;
 39848                                  ; INPUT : ES = segment where program got loaded
 39849                                  ;
 39850                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39851                                  
 39852                                  rpFind1:
 39853                                  	db	0FAh, 0E4h, 21h, 60h, 33h, 0C0h, 0E6h, 43h, 8Bh, 16h
 39854                                  
 39855                                  rpFind1Len equ	$ - rpFind1
 39856                                  
 39857                                  ;	cli
 39858                                  ;	in	al, 21h
 39859                                  ;	pusha
 39860                                  ;	xor	ax, ax
 39861                                  ;	out	43h, al
 39862                                  ;	mov	dx, ...
 39863                                  
 39864                                  rpFind1a:
 39865                                  	db	0B0h, 0Eh, 0E6h, 37h, 33h, 0C0h, 0E6h, 0F2h
 39866                                  
 39867                                  rpFind1aLen equ	$ - rpFind1a
 39868                                  
 39869                                  ;	mov	al, 0Eh
 39870                                  ;	out	37h, al
 39871                                  ;	xor	ax, ax
 39872                                  ;	out	0F2h, al
 39873                                  
 39874                                  ; bug # 1 -- loss of high EAX on 386+ if not VCPI or DPMI
 39875                                  
 39876                                  rpFind2:
 39877                                  	db	0Fh, 20h, 0C0h
 39878                                  
 39879                                  rpFind2Len equ	$ - rpFind2
 39880                                  
 39881                                  ;	mov	eax, cr0	;may be preceeded by PUSH CX (51h)
 39882                                  
 39883                                  rpFind3:
 39884                                  	db	0Fh, 22h, 0C0h, 0EAh
 39885                                  
 39886                                  rpFind3Len equ	$ - rpFind3
 39887                                  
 39888                                  ;	mov	cr0, eax	;may be preceeded by POP CX (59h)
 39889                                  ;	jmp	far ptr xxx	;change far ptr to go to replace3
 39890                                  ;	mov	ss, bx		;8E D3 ... and come back at or after this
 39891                                  
 39892                                  ; note, there is no rpRepl1 string
 39893                                  
 39894                                  rpRepl2:
 39895                                   	db	66h, 50h, 51h, 0Fh, 20h, 0C0h
 39896                                  
 39897                                  rpRepl2Len equ	$ - rpRepl2
 39898                                  
 39899                                  ;	push	eax
 39900                                  ;	push	cx
 39901                                  ;	mov	eax, cr0
 39902                                  
 39903                                  rpRepl3:
 39904                                  	db	8Eh, 0D3h, 59h, 66h, 58h
 39905                                  
 39906                                  rpRepl3Len equ	$ - rpRepl3
 39907                                  
 39908                                  ;	mov	ss, bx
 39909                                  ;	pop	cx
 39910                                  ;	pop	eax
 39911                                  
 39912                                  ; bug # 2 -- loss of high EAX and ESI on 386+ only if VCPI
 39913                                  
 39914                                  rpFind4:
 39915                                  	db	93h, 58h, 8Bh, 0CCh
 39916                                  
 39917                                  rpFind4Len equ	$ - rpFind4
 39918                                  
 39919                                  ;	xchg	bx, ax
 39920                                  ;	pop	ax
 39921                                  ;	mov	cx, sp
 39922                                  
 39923                                  rpFind5:
 39924                                  	db	0B8h, 0Ch, 0DEh, 0CDh, 67h, 8Bh, 0E1h, 0FFh, 0E3h
 39925                                  
 39926                                  rpFind5Len equ	$ - rpFind5
 39927                                  
 39928                                  ;	mov	ax, DE0Ch
 39929                                  ;	int	67h
 39930                                  ;	mov	sp, cx
 39931                                  ;	jmp	bx
 39932                                  
 39933                                  rpRepl4:
 39934                                  	db	93h, 58h, 8Bh, 0CCh
 39935                                  	db	02Eh, 066h, 0A3h
 39936                                  
 39937                                  rpRepl4o1Len equ $ - rpRepl4
 39938                                  
 39939                                  	db	00h, 00h
 39940                                  	db	02Eh, 066h, 89h, 36h
 39941                                  
 39942                                  rpRepl4o2Len equ $ - rpRepl4
 39943                                  
 39944                                  	db	00h, 00h
 39945                                  
 39946                                  rpRepl4Len equ	$ - rpRepl4
 39947                                  
 39948                                  ;	xchg	bx, ax
 39949                                  ;	pop	ax
 39950                                  ;	mov	cx, sp
 39951                                  ;	mov	dword ptr cs:[xxxx], eax
 39952                                  ;	mov	dword ptr cs:[xxxx], esi
 39953                                  
 39954                                  rpRepl5:
 39955                                  	db	8Bh, 0E1h
 39956                                  	db	2Eh, 66h, 0A1h
 39957                                  
 39958                                  rpRepl5o1Len equ $ - rpRepl5
 39959                                  
 39960                                  	db	00h, 00h
 39961                                  	db	2Eh, 66h, 8Bh, 36h
 39962                                  
 39963                                  rpRepl5o2Len equ $ - rpRepl5
 39964                                  
 39965                                  	db	00h, 00h
 39966                                  	db	0FFh, 0E3h
 39967                                  
 39968                                  rpRepl5Len equ	$ - rpRepl5
 39969                                  
 39970                                  ;	mov	sp, cx
 39971                                  ;	mov	eax, dword ptr cs:[xxxx]
 39972                                  ;	mov	esi, dword ptr cs:[xxxx]
 39973                                  ;	jmp	bx
 39974                                  
 39975                                  ; bug # 3 -- loss of high EAX, EBX, ECX, EDX on 386+ only if VCPI
 39976                                  
 39977                                  rpFind6:
 39978                                  	db	0FAh, 52h, 51h
 39979                                  
 39980                                  rpFind6Len equ	$ - rpFind6
 39981                                  
 39982                                  ;	cli
 39983                                  ;	push	dx
 39984                                  ;	push	cx
 39985                                  
 39986                                  rpFind7a:
 39987                                  	db	0B8h, 0Ch, 0DEh, 66h, 26h, 0FFh, 1Eh
 39988                                  
 39989                                  rpFind7aLen equ	$ - rpFind7a
 39990                                  
 39991                                  ;	mov	ax, 0DE0Ch
 39992                                  ;	call	fword ptr es:[xxxx]
 39993                                  
 39994                                  rpFind7b:
 39995                                  	db	59h, 5Ah, 5Bh
 39996                                  
 39997                                  rpFind7bLen equ	$ - rpFind7b
 39998                                  
 39999                                  ;	pop	cx
 40000                                  ;	pop	dx
 40001                                  ;	pop	bx
 40002                                  
 40003                                  rpRepl6 :
 40004                                  	db	0FAh, 66h, 50h, 66h, 53h, 66h, 51h, 66h, 52h
 40005                                  
 40006                                  rpRepl6Len equ	$ - rpRepl6
 40007                                  
 40008                                  ;	cli
 40009                                  ;	push	eax
 40010                                  ;	push	ebx
 40011                                  ;	push	ecx
 40012                                  ;	push	edx
 40013                                  
 40014                                  rpRepl7:
 40015                                  	db	66h, 5Ah, 66h, 59h, 66h, 5Bh, 66h, 58h, 5Bh
 40016                                  
 40017                                  rpRepl7Len equ	$ - rpRepl7
 40018                                  
 40019                                  ;	pop	edx
 40020                                  ;	pop	ecx
 40021                                  ;	pop	ebx
 40022                                  ;	pop	eax
 40023                                  ;	pop	bx
 40024                                  
 40025                                  ; bug # 4 -- loss of high EAX and EBX on 386+ only if VCPI
 40026                                  
 40027                                  rpFind8:
 40028                                   	db	60h, 06h, 1Eh, 0B8h, 00h, 00h, 8Eh, 0D8h
 40029                                  
 40030                                  rpFind8Len equ	$ - rpFind8
 40031                                  
 40032                                  ;	pusha
 40033                                  ;	push	es
 40034                                  ;	push	ds
 40035                                  ;	mov	ax, dgroup	;jump back to here from replace8
 40036                                  ;	mov	ds, ax
 40037                                  
 40038                                  rpFind9 :
 40039                                  	db	1Fh, 07h, 61h
 40040                                  
 40041                                  rpFind9Len equ	$ - rpFind9
 40042                                  
 40043                                  ;	pop	ds
 40044                                  ;	pop	es
 40045                                  ;	popa
 40046                                  
 40047                                  rpRepl8:
 40048                                   	db	66h, 60h, 06h, 1Eh
 40049                                  
 40050                                  rpRepl8Len equ	$ - rpRepl8
 40051                                  
 40052                                  ;	pushad
 40053                                  ;	push	es
 40054                                  ;	push	ds
 40055                                  
 40056                                  rpRepl9:
 40057                                  	db	1Fh, 07h, 66h, 61h, 0C3h
 40058                                  
 40059                                  rpRepl9Len equ	$ - rpRepl9
 40060                                  
 40061                                  ;	pop	ds
 40062                                  ;	pop	es
 40063                                  ;	popad
 40064                                  ;	retn			;no need to jmp back to main-line
 40065                                  
 40066                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40067                                  
 40068                                  struc SearchPair
 40069                                   .sp_off1: resw 1	; offset of 1st search string
 40070                                   .sp_len1: resw 1	; length of 1st search string
 40071                                   .sp_off2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 40072                                   .sp_len2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 40073                                   .sp_diff: resw 1	; max difference between offsets
 40074                                   .size:
 40075                                  endstruc
 40076                                  
 40077                                  ;rpBug1Strs SearchPair	<offset rpFind2, rpFind2Len, offset rpFind3, rpFind3Len, 20h>
 40078                                  
 40079                                  rpBug1Strs:
 40080                                  	dw	rpFind2
 40081                                  	dw	rpFind2Len ; 3
 40082                                  	dw	rpFind3
 40083                                  	dw	rpFind3Len ; 4
 40084                                  	dw	20h
 40085                                  
 40086                                  ;rpBug2Strs SearchPair	<offset rpFind4, rpFind4Len, offset rpFind5, rpFind5Len, 80h>
 40087                                  
 40088                                  rpBug2Strs:
 40089                                  	dw	rpFind4
 40090                                  	dw	rpFind4Len ; 4
 40091                                  	dw	rpFind5
 40092                                  	dw	rpFind5Len ; 9
 40093                                  	dw	80h
 40094                                  
 40095                                  ;rpBug3Strs SearchPair	<offset rpFind6, rpFind6Len, offset rpFind7a, rpFind7aLen, 80h>
 40096                                  
 40097                                  rpBug3Strs:
 40098                                  	dw	rpFind6
 40099                                  	dw	rpFind6Len ; 3
 40100                                  	dw	rpFind7a
 40101                                  	dw	rpFind7aLen ; 7
 40102                                  	dw	80h
 40103                                  
 40104                                  ;rpBug4Strs SearchPair	<offset rpFind8, 4, offset rpFind9, rpFind9Len, 80h>
 40105                                  
 40106                                  rpBug4Strs:
 40107                                  	dw	rpFind8
 40108                                  	dw	4
 40109                                  	dw	rpFind9
 40110                                  	dw	rpFind9Len ; 3
 40111                                  	dw	80h
 40112                                  
 40113                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40114                                  
 40115                                  struc StackVars
 40116                                   .sv_wVersion:	resw 1		; Rational extender version #
 40117                                   .sv_cbCodeSeg: resw 1		; code seg size to scan
 40118                                   .sv_pPatch:	resw 1		; offset of next avail patch byte
 40119                                   .size:
 40120                                  endstruc
 40121                                  
 40122                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40123                                  
 40124                                  ; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 40125                                  
 40126                                  Rational386Patch:
 40127                                  	; Do a few quick checks to see if this looks like a Rational
 40128                                  	; Extended application. Hopefully this will quickly weed out
 40129                                  	; most non Rational apps.
 40130                                  
 40131                                  	cmp	word [es:0],395		; version number goes here - versions
 40132                                  	jae	short rp3QuickOut	;   3.95+ don't need patching
 40133                                  
 40134                                  	cmp	word [es:0Ch],20h	; always has this value here
 40135                                  	jne	short rp3QuickOut
 40136                                  
 40137                                  	push	ax
 40138                                  
 40139                                  	mov	ax,18h 			; extender has 18h at
 40140                                  	cmp	[es:24],ax		;   offsets 24, 28, & 36
 40141                                  	jne	short rp3QO_ax
 40142                                  	cmp	[es:28],ax
 40143                                  	jne	short rp3QO_ax
 40144                                  	cmp	[es:36],ax
 40145                                  	je	short rp3Maybe
 40146                                  rp3QO_ax:
 40147                                  	pop	ax
 40148                                  rp3QuickOut:
 40149                                  	retn
 40150                                  
 40151                                  ; It might be the rational extender, do more extensive checking
 40152                                  
 40153                                  rp3Maybe:
 40154                                  	cld
 40155                                  	push	bx			; note ax pushed above
 40156                                  	push	cx
 40157                                  	push	dx
 40158                                  	push	si
 40159                                  	push	di
 40160                                  	push	es
 40161                                  	push	ds			; we use all of them
 40162                                  	push	bp
 40163                                  	sub	sp,StackVars.size  ; 6	; make space for stack variables
 40164                                  	mov	bp,sp
 40165                                  
 40166                                  	push	cs
 40167                                  	pop	ds
 40168                                  
 40169                                  	mov	ax,[es:0]		; save version #
 40170                                  	;mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_wVersion],ax
 40171                                  	mov	[bp],ax	
 40172                                  					; check that binary version # matches
 40173                                  	call	VerifyVersion		;   ascii string
 40174                                  	jne	short rp3Exit_j
 40175                                  
 40176                                  ; Looks like this is it, find where to put the patch code.  The
 40177                                  ; patch will be located on top of Rational code specific to 80286
 40178                                  ; processors, so these patchs MUST NOT be applied if running on
 40179                                  ; an 80286 system.
 40180                                  
 40181                                  	; Rational says the code to patch will never be beyond offset 46xxh
 40182                                  
 40183                                  	mov	cx,4500h		; force search len to 4700h (searches
 40184                                  	;mov	[bp+2],cx
 40185                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_cbCodeSeg],cx	; start at offset 200h)
 40186                                  
 40187                                  	mov	es,[es:20h]		; es=code segment
 40188                                  
 40189                                  	mov	si,rpFind1		; string to find
 40190                                  	mov	dx,rpFind1Len ; 10	; length to match
 40191                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq		; look for code seq
 40192                                  	jz	short rpGotPatch
 40193                                  
 40194                                  ; According to Rational, some very old versions of the extender may not
 40195                                  ; have the find1 code sequence. If the find1 code wasn't found above,
 40196                                  ; try an alternative patch area which is on top of NEC 98xx switching code.
 40197                                  
 40198                                  	mov	si,rpFind1a
 40199                                  	mov	dx,rpFind1aLen  ;8
 40200                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq
 40201                                  	jz	short rpGotPatch
 40202                                  
 40203                                  rp3Exit_j:
 40204                                  	jmp	rp3Exit
 40205                                  
 40206                                  ; Found the location to write patch code! DI = offset in code seg.
 40207                                  
 40208                                  rpGotPatch:
 40209                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 40210                                  	mov	[bp-StackVars.sv_pPatch],di	; save patch pointer
 40211

 40213                                  ; Bug # 1 -- loss of high EAX on 386+ if not VCPI or DPMI
 40214

 40222                                  	jc	short rpBug2
 40223                                  
 40224                                  ; si = rpFind2 offset, di = rpFind3 offset

 40248                                  	;mov	[es:di+4],ax

 40259                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 40260                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch], di	;   to main-line, update patch
 40261                                  						;   area pointer
 40262                                  
 40263                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40264                                  ; Bug # 2 -- loss of high regs on 386+ under VCPI only
 40265                                  
 40266                                  rpBug2:
 40267                                  	mov	bx,rpBug2Strs			; locate find4 & find5 code
 40268                                  	call	FindBadCode
 40269                                  	jc	short rpBug3
 40270                                  
 40271                                  ; si = rpFind4 offset, di = rpFind5 offset
 40272                                  
 40273                                  	;push	word [bp+4]
 40274                                  	push	word [bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; save current patch pointer
 40275                                  						;   (where repl4 goes)
 40276                                  	push	di				; save find5 offset
 40277                                  
 40278                                  	mov	di,si
 40279                                  	mov	dx,rpFind4Len ; 4
 40280                                  	mov	si,rpRepl4
 40281                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl4Len ; 15
 40282                                  	call	GenPatch			; patch out find4 code
 40283                                  
 40284                                  	pop	di				; find5 offset
 40285                                  	add	di,5				; keep 5 bytes of find5 code
 40286                                  	;mov	bx,[bp+4]
 40287                                  	mov	bx,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; jump to patch area
 40288                                  	push	bx				; save repl5 location
 40289                                  	call	GenJump
 40290                                  
 40291                                  	mov	si,rpRepl5			; copy repl5 code to patch
 40292                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl5Len  ; 15		;   area -- it has a jmp bx
 40293                                  	call	CopyPatch			;   so no need to jmp back to
 40294                                  						;   main-line code
 40295                                  
 40296                                  ; patches have been made, now update the patch code to store/load dwords just
 40297                                  ; after the code in the patch area
 40298                                  
 40299                                  	pop	di				; repl5 location
 40300                                  	pop	si				; repl4 location
 40301                                  
 40302                                  	;mov	ax,[bp+4]
 40303                                  	mov	ax,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; (where dwords go)
 40304                                  
 40305                                  	;mov	[es:si+7],ax
 40306                                  	mov	[es:si+rpRepl4o1Len],ax		; offset for EAX
 40307                                  	;mov	[es:di+5],ax
 40308                                  	mov	[es:di+rpRepl5o1Len],ax
 40309                                  	add	ax,4
 40310                                  	;mov	[es:si+0Dh],ax
 40311                                  	mov	[es:si+rpRepl4o2Len],ax		; offset for ESI
 40312                                  	;mov	[es:di+0Bh],ax
 40313                                  	mov	[es:di+rpRepl5o2Len],ax
 40314                                  
 40315                                  	;add	word [bp+4],8
 40316                                  	add	word [bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch],8	; reserve space for 2 dwords in
 40317                                  						; patch area
 40318                                  
 40319                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40320                                  ; Bug # 3 -- loss of high regs on 386+ under VCPI only
 40321                                  
 40322                                  rpBug3:
 40323                                  	mov	bx,rpBug3Strs			; locate find6 & find7a code
 40324                                  	call	FindBadCode
 40325                                  	jc	short rpBug4
 40326                                  
 40327                                  	;add	di,9
 40328                                  	add	di,rpFind7aLen + 2		; skip over offset in find7a
 40329                                  	push	si				;   code and locate find7b
 40330                                  	mov	si,rpFind7b			;   sequence
 40331                                  	mov	dx,rpFind7bLen ; 3
 40332                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq_di
 40333                                  	pop	si
 40334                                  	jnz	short rpBug4
 40335                                  
 40336                                  	push	di				; save find7b code offset
 40337                                  
 40338                                  	mov	di,si
 40339                                  	mov	dx,rpFind6Len ; 3
 40340                                  	mov	si,rpRepl6
 40341                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl6Len ; 9

 40343

 40346                                  	mov	si,rpRepl7
 40347                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl7Len ; 9
 40348                                  	call	GenPatch			; patch out find7b code
 40349                                  
 40350                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40351                                  ; Bug # 4 -- loss of high regs on 386+ under VCPI only
 40352                                  
 40353                                  rpBug4:
 40354                                  	;cmp	word [bp+0],360
 40355                                  	;cmp	word [bp+StackVars.sv_wVersion],360 ; only applies if 
 40356                                  	cmp	word [bp],360
 40357                                  	jbe	short rp3Exit 			; version > 3.60 and < 3.95
 40358                                  
 40359                                  	mov	bx,rpBug4Strs			; locate find8 & find9 code
 40360                                  	call	FindBadCode
 40361                                  	jc	short rp3Exit

 40364

 40375                                  
 40376                                  	mov	si,rpRepl9			; copy replacement code to
 40377                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl9Len ; 5		;   patch area--it does a RET
 40378                                  	call	CopyPatch			;   so no jmp back to main-line
 40379                                  
 40380                                  rp3Exit:
 40381                                  	add	sp,StackVars.size
 40382                                  	pop	bp
 40383                                  	pop	ds
 40384                                  	pop	es
 40385                                  	pop	di

 40387                                  	pop	dx

 40390                                  	pop	ax

 40392                                  
 40393                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40394                                  ;
 40395                                  ; FindBadCode
 40396                                  ;
 40397                                  ; Searches Rational code segment looking for a pair of find strings (all
 40398                                  ; patches have at least two find strings).
 40399                                  ;
 40400                                  ; Entry:
 40401                                  ;	ES    = code segment to search
 40402                                  ;	DS:BX = search pair structure for this search
 40403                                  ;	[bp].sv_cbCodeSeg = length of code seg to search
 40404                                  ;
 40405                                  ; Exit:
 40406                                  ;	CY flag clear if both strings found, and
 40407                                  ;	SI    = offset in ES of 1st string
 40408                                  ;	DI    = offset in ES of 2nd string
 40409                                  ;	CY set if either string not found, or strings too far apart
 40410                                  ;
 40411                                  ; Used:
 40412                                  ;	CX
 40413                                  ;
 40414                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40415                                  
 40416                                  ;struc SearchPair
 40417                                  ; .sp_off1: resw 1	; offset of 1st search string
 40418                                  ; .sp_len1: resw 1	; length of 1st search string
 40419                                  ; .sp_off2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 40420                                  ; .sp_len2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 40421                                  ; .sp_diff: resw 1	; max difference between offsets
 40422                                  ; .size:
 40423                                  ;endstruc
 40424                                  
 40425                                  FindBadCode:
 40426                                  	;mov	cx,[bp+2]
 40427                                  	mov	cx,[bp+StackVars.sv_cbCodeSeg]	; search length
 40428                                  
 40429                                  	mov	si,[bx]	; mov si,[bx+0]
 40430                                  	;mov	si,[bx+Searchpair.sp_off1] ; ds:si -> search string
 40431                                  	
 40432                                  	;mov	dx,[bx+2]
 40433                                  	mov	dx,[bx+SearchPair.sp_len1] ; dx = search len
 40434                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq
 40435                                  	jnz	short fbc_error		; done if 1st not found
 40436                                  
 40437                                  	push	di			; save 1st string offset
 40438                                  
 40439                                  	;mov	si,[bx+4]
 40440                                  	mov	si,[bx+SearchPair.sp_off2]
 40441                                  	;mov	dx,[bx+6]
 40442                                  	mov	dx,[bx+SearchPair.sp_len2]
 40443                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq_di		; don't change flags after this!
 40444                                  
 40445                                  	pop	si			; restore 1st string offset
 40446                                  	jnz	short fbc_error
 40447                                  
 40448                                  	mov	ax,di			; sanity check that
 40449                                  	sub	ax,si			;   si < di && di - si <= allowed diff
 40450                                  	jc	short fbc_error
 40451                                  	;cmp	ax,[bx+8]
 40452                                  	cmp	ax,[bx+SearchPair.sp_diff]
 40453                                  	ja	short fbc_error
 40454                                  
 40455                                  	clc
 40456                                  	retn
 40457                                  
 40458                                  fbc_error:
 40459                                  	stc
 40460                                  	retn
 40461                                  
 40462                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40463                                  ;
 40464                                  ; GenPatch
 40465                                  ;
 40466                                  ; Generate a patch sequence. 1) insert a jump at the buggy code location
 40467                                  ; (jumps to the patch code area), 2) copy the selected patch code to the
 40468                                  ; patch area, 3) insert a jump from the patch area back to the main-line
 40469                                  ; code.
 40470                                  ;
 40471                                  ; Entry:
 40472                                  ;	ES:DI = start of buggy code to be patched
 40473                                  ;	DX    = length of buggy code to be patched
 40474                                  ;	DS:SI = replacement patch code
 40475                                  ;	CX    = length of replacement patch code
 40476                                  ;	[bp].sv_pPatch = offset in ES of where to copy patch code
 40477                                  ;
 40478                                  ; Exit:
 40479                                  ;	DI, [bp].sv_pPatch = byte after generated patch code
 40480                                  ;
 40481                                  ; Used:
 40482                                  ;	AX, BX, SI, Flags
 40483                                  ;
 40484                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40485                                  
 40486                                  GenPatch:
 40487                                  	push	di			;save offset of buggy code
 40488                                  
 40489                                  	;mov	bx,[bp+4]
 40490                                  	mov	bx,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]
 40491                                  					;jump from buggy code to patch area
 40492                                  	call	GenJump
 40493                                  
 40494                                  	call	CopyPatch		;copy replacement code to patch area
 40495                                  
 40496                                  	pop	bx			;offset of buggy code + buggy code
 40497                                  	add	bx,dx			;  length = return from patch offset
 40498                                  
 40499                                  	call	GenJump 		;jump from patch area back to main-
 40500                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 40501                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch],di
 40502                                  					;  line code, update patch pointer
 40503                                  	retn
 40504                                  
 40505                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40506                                  ;
 40507                                  ; CopyPatch
 40508                                  ;
 40509                                  ; Copies patch code to patch location.
 40510                                  ;
 40511                                  ; Entry:
 40512                                  ;	DS:SI = patch code to be copied
 40513                                  ;	ES    = segment of code to patch
 40514                                  ;	CX    = length of code to copy
 40515                                  ;	[bp].sv_pPatch = offset in ES of where to copy patch code
 40516                                  ;
 40517                                  ; Exit:
 40518                                  ;	DI, [bp].sv_pPatch = byte after copied patch code
 40519                                  ;
 40520                                  ; Used:
 40521                                  ;	SI, Flags
 40522                                  ;
 40523                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40524                                  
 40525                                  CopyPatch:
 40526                                  	push	cx
 40527                                  	;mov	di,[bp+4]
 40528                                  	mov	di,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch] ;patch pointer is the dest offset
 40529                                  	cld
 40530                                  	rep movsb
 40531                                  	pop	cx
 40532                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 40533                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch],di ;update net pointer location
 40534                                  	retn
 40535                                  
 40536                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40537                                  ;
 40538                                  ; GenJump
 40539                                  ;
 40540                                  ; Generates a rel16 JMP instruction at location 'from' to location 'to'.
 40541                                  ;
 40542                                  ; Entry:
 40543                                  ;	ES:DI = from location (where to put jmp instruction)
 40544                                  ;	BX    = to location (where to jump to)
 40545                                  ;
 40546                                  ; Exit:
 40547                                  ;	DI = byte after generated jump
 40548                                  ;
 40549                                  ; Used:
 40550                                  ;	AX
 40551                                  ;
 40552                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40553                                  
 40554                                  GenJump:
 40555                                  	mov	al,0E9h		; jmp rel16 opcode
 40556                                  	stosb
 40557                                  
 40558                                  	mov	ax,bx		; calc offset to 'to' location
 40559                                  	sub	ax,di
 40560                                  	sub	ax,2
 40561                                  
 40562                                  	stosw			; output offset
 40563                                  
 40564                                  	retn
 40565                                  
 40566                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40567                                  ;
 40568                                  ; ScanCodeSeq
 40569                                  ;
 40570                                  ; Looks for a pattern pointed to by DS:SI & len DX in ES:200 to ES:200+CX-1
 40571                                  ;
 40572                                  ; returns in ES:DI the start of the pattern if Zero flag is set
 40573                                  ;
 40574                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40575                                  
 40576                                  ScanCodeSeq:
 40577                                  	mov	di,200h
 40578                                  ScanCodeSeq_di:
 40579                                  	push	cx
 40580                                  	sub	cx,dx
 40581                                  	inc	cx
 40582                                  scsagain:
 40583                                  	push	si
 40584                                  	push	di
 40585                                  	push	cx
 40586                                  	mov	cx,dx
 40587                                  	rep	cmpsb
 40588                                  	pop	cx
 40589                                  	pop	di
 40590                                  	pop	si
 40591                                  	je	short scsfound
 40592                                  	inc	di
 40593                                  	loop	scsagain
 40594                                  scsfound:
 40595                                  	pop	cx
 40596                                  vvexit:		; 18/12/2022
 40597                                  	retn
 40598                                  	
 40599                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40600                                  ;
 40601                                  ; VerifyVersion
 40602                                  ;
 40603                                  ; Checks whether the binary version from ES:0 matches the ASCII version
 40604                                  ; from ES:2A.
 40605                                  ;
 40606                                  ;       Entry: AX = binary version number 
 40607                                  ;       Exit : Z flag set if version numbers match
 40608                                  ;
 40609                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40610                                  
 40611                                  VerifyVersion:
 40612                                  	mov	si,[es:2Ah]		; offset of version number
 40613                                  					;  in ascii
 40614                                  	mov	bl,10
 40615                                  	add	si,3			; point to last digit
 40616                                  
 40617                                  	call	VVDigit
 40618                                  	jne	short vvexit
 40619                                  	call	VVDigit
 40620                                  	jne	short vvexit
 40621                                  	cmp	byte [es:si],'.'
 40622                                  	jne	short vvexit
 40623                                  	dec	si
 40624                                  	;call	VVDigit
 40625                                  	; 18/12/2022
 40626                                  	;jmp	short VVDigit
 40627                                  ;vvexit:
 40628                                  	;retn
 40629                                  VVDigit:
 40630                                  	div	bl
 40631                                  	add	ah,'0'
 40632                                  	dec	si
 40633                                  	cmp	[es:si+1],ah
 40634                                  	mov	ah,0			; do not xor or sub we need Z
 40635                                  	retn
 40636                                  
 40637                                  %endif
 40638

 40901                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 40902                                  ;
 40903                                  ; Procedure Name 	: ExePackPatch
 40904                                  ;
 40905                                  ; Inputs	 	: DS 			-> DOSDATA
 40906                                  ;			  ES:0 			-> read in image
 40907                                  ;			  ax:cx = start cs:ip of program
 40908                                  ; Output		:		
 40909                                  ;
 40910                                  ;	1. If ES <= 0fffh
 40911                                  ;	   2. if exepack signature ('RB') found
 40912                                  ;	      3. if common code to patch compares (for 3 diff. versions)
 40913                                  ;	       	 4. if rest of the code & checksum compares
 40914                                  ;	  	    5. overlay buggy code with code in 
 40915                                  ;		       doscode:str1.
 40916                                  ;		 6. endif
 40917                                  ;	      7. endif
 40918                                  ;	   8. endif
 40919                                  ;	9. endif
 40920                                  ;
 40921                                  ;
 40922                                  ; Uses			: NONE
 40923                                  ;
 40924                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 40925                                  		
 40926                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 40927                                  	; 23/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0	
 40928                                  ExePackPatch:
 40929 0000761B 53                      	push	bx
 40930 0000761C 8CC3                    	mov	bx,es			; bx has load segment
 40931 0000761E 81FBFF0F                	cmp	bx,0FFFh		; Q: is the load segment > 64K
 40932 00007622 7602                    	jbe	short ep_cont		; N: 
 40933 00007624 5B                      	pop	bx			; Y: no need to patch
 40934 00007625 C3                      	retn
 40935                                  ep_cont:
 40936 00007626 1E                      	push	ds
 40937 00007627 06                      	push	es
 40938 00007628 50                      	push	ax
 40939 00007629 51                      	push	cx
 40940 0000762A 56                      	push	si
 40941 0000762B 57                      	push	di
 40942                                  	
 40943                                  		; M033 - start
 40944                                  		; exepacked programs have an IP of 12h (>=2)
 40945                                  
 40946 0000762C 83E902                  	sub	cx,2			; Q: is IP >=2 
 40947 0000762F 7303                    	jnb	short epp_1		; N: exit
 40948 00007631 E9C500                  	jmp	ep_notpacked
 40949                                  					; ax:cx now points to location of
 40950                                  					; 'RB' if this is an exepacked file.
 40951                                  		; M033 - end
 40952                                  epp_1:

 40954 00007636 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 40955 00007638 36893E[8700]            	mov	[ss:UNPACK_OFFSET],di	; save pointer to 'RB' in 
 40956                                  					; unpack_offset
 40957                                  
 40958 0000763D 26813D5242              	cmp	word [es:di],'RB' ; 4252h
 40959                                  	;ljne	ep_notpacked
 40960 00007642 7403                    	je	short epp_2
 40961 00007644 E9B200                  	jmp	ep_notpacked
 40962                                  epp_2:

 40965

 40968                                  					;          file where we hope to find
 40969                                  					;	   scan string. 
 40970                                  
 40971 0000764C E8B200                  	call	chk_common_str		; check for match
 40972                                  
 40973 0000764F 7524                    	jnz	short ep_chkpatch2	; Q: does the patch match
 40974                                  					; N: check at patch2_offset
 40975                                  					; Y: check for rest of patch string

 40977                                  					; ds:si -> scan string 
 40978 00007654 368B3E[8700]            	mov	di,[ss:UNPACK_OFFSET]	; restore di to point to 'RB'

 40992 00007668 7208                    	jc	short ep_done1		; Q: did we pass the test

 41118                                  ; 	Procedure Name	: chk_common_str
 41119                                  ;
 41120                                  ;	Input		: DS = DOSCODE

 41122                                  ;
 41123                                  ;	Output		; Z if match else NZ
 41124                                  ;
